title: The Art of conducting
brief_description: This unique program features sixteen of the greatest composers of the century in rehearsals and performance. This revealing and intimate archival footage is complemented by first hand recollections of the conductors in question, as well as with eminent musicians from today. Commentary is provided by the following artists: John Eliot Gardiner, Isaac Stern, Jack Brymer, Sir Thomas Beecham, Yehudi Menuhin, Oliver Knussen, Suvi Raj Grubb, George Szell, Bruno Walter, Otto Klemperer, Hugh Bean, Werner Tharichen, Richard Mohr, Leopold Stokowski, Julius Baker and Herbert von Karajan.
